Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
main.DashboardController
public class DashboardController extends Object
The DashboardController class handles user interactions on the dashboard screen. It provides navigation to different sections of the application such as guest management, reservation management, and room management.

    • handlesGuestButton

      private void handlesGuestButton()
      Handles the "Guest" button click event. Navigates the user to the guest management screen.

      public void handleLogOutButton()
